phrases: This 50-times gravity is as tough as you would expect.
Yamucha and the others must be going at it.
l wonder if it is the same training that I did.
No, I cannot afford to be doing that.
And he was so close, too?
M- my body is so heavy...
I have no intention of doing the same training as those guys.
There is an order to these things, you know... huh?
Anyhow, when you try to jump straight to the end, things are apt to turn out badly.
By the way, if you are not doing anything, would you like to pull weeds with me?
Why are you in such a hurry to grow stronger?
You promised me that you had given up on defeating Freeza, did not you?
Liars have to swallow a thousand needles, you know.
For that matter, you should be enjoying your life here in the Next World more.
This can be quite fun to do.
You are just playing the fool.
Son Goku was something else, but you guys eat a lot too, huh?
We cannot be outdone by Goku!
If he ate 10 bowls, then I will eat 20!
If you do not stop now, you will eat my portion, too...
Oh, it is, it is, huh?
I know I may not look it, but when I was a youngster, I went to this cooking class,
and I was so good the teacher there told me I would make a good husband someday,
so I am somewhat confident of my ability to- huh?
The dead these days have no sense of moderation.
Okay, now that my belly is full, I will be fine.
I will catch you this time for sure.
You will not be able to do that to me any longer.
I am surprised you can get by on just water.
Once they have gotten a handle on this, they will make rapid progress.
I have no interest in those small fry.
I will not allow the existence of anyone stronger than me.
That is all there is to it.
Even Chaozu has mastered this, has he?
All right, I will give you your next training lesson.
This guy is your next opponent.
Please knock me down as hard as you can with this hammer.
You do not need to hold back.
That assumes that you can keep up with my speed.
All right, I will do it.
W- what is with this weight!?
Hey, Piccolo, are not you going to do this?
It is a waste of time.
We are going to take a nap now!
Piccolo is sleeping comfortably out back.
Do not push yourselves too hard.
I- I am not about to be lumped in with that guy!
There is someone even stronger than that Saiyan.
His life signs are extremely faint.
Even if he does pull through, I am not sure whether or not he will regain consciousness.
Make sure he recovers, no matter what it takes!
Use whatever methods you have to, understand!?
Otherwise, it will mean my life.
You can do it, you can do it!
-Okay, this is it, the bottom of the 9th, 2 outs, bases loaded!
If he runs away, the walk scores a run, and it is goodbye!
You are trying to make a fool of me!
V- very well, I will show you!
It is not going to be that easy!
Hit this one, if you can!
When you go out, call out to someone first, and lock everyone else out!
That was a come-from-behind, bases-loaded, say-goodbye home run.
Oh my, Gregory, what are you doing?
With Chaozu's hit just now, we have all cleared him.
T- these guys did not hold back at all.
Oh, my, just over an hour?
Are you sure you are not going too fast?
Okay, Kaio- sama, please give us our next training.
Nothing is better than sparring to learn each other's
As a matter of fact, we have been waiting for this.
Oh, hold on, hold on, I will determine the match-ups.
Let us see, who should I put you with?
Oh ho, you have woken up, have you?
You think I can fight decently against someone
who had trouble with a monkey, or some batter?
At your level, even if there were ten of you, you would still be a pushover.
You bastard, now you have said it!
My, my, what a humorless conversation this is.
Did you come here to fight?
Well, there is some truth to what Piccolo says.
To be honest, at your current ability, a one-on-one fight would be absurd.
But with all three of you, perhaps-
They do not even have a 1 in 10,000 chance of winning.
You want to go at it?
l'll put you away in five seconds.
They are surprisingly tough, are not they?
You do not need to worry yourself pointlessly.
The pain of the body is just a remnant of when you were alive.
Up until a little while ago, their movements were so slow,
and suddenly, l barely recognize them.
ls this because of Kaio's training?
Yeah, and then we will fight you again.
That same trick is not going to work anymore.
We are moving on to the next training.
A vegetable you eat in the morning ( asa ) that makes you fart is called asa -para-gas...
There is quite a bit of damage here.
If you do not regain consciousness,
l'm the one who Freeza- sama is going to take it out on, after all.
Then again, even if you do come back to life here,
you will be on your way to hell again by Freeza- sama's hand soon enough anyhow.
Well, all there is to do now is wait for you to wake up.
Do not give us any more trouble, okay?
W- what was that explosion just now!?
Looks like you have underestimated my powers of recovery, huh?
Dammit, it is coming from the treatment chamber, all right!
You must find him at all costs!
He could not have gotten far yet!
You fell for it all too easily.
Allow me to take this current opportunity to inform you that your era is at an end.
Vegeta, the miracle man who returned from the brink of death...
Will he be able to outwit Freeza and collect the Dragon Balls?
